name: CANOEING TO "YEN" ISLAND - THE GRAVE OF GENERAL VO NGUYEN GIAP
description: Enjoying fresh air and blue water and listening to the waves and birds along Nhat Le beach, you will set foot to a beautiful land - being a harmonious combination of sea, mountain, island that makes a triangular with a spectacular scene in the fairy tales.Vung Chua is a small beach with a white sand and gentle sea waves. It is created by a rocky mountainside encroached into the sea, and people living here call it as Rong Mountain. The natural landscape here is very beautiful, poetic.
